Articles.Content:
Hello KSP gang,

just wondering if anyone of you out there has made something like a calendar of transfer windows??

IIRC I saw something like this on here before, at least for one single planet I think.

Thanks in advance

Daf

http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/

Or this:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fSr2UUYdcWf1ioJmYdF8a-qo0lA_ujC9kKfS1m5Q--E/edit?pli=1#gid=0

Keep in mind that was back when game time was in earth days... the day and time will be different if you have your clock set to kerbin time.

Also old in Earth time:

http://eiden.fi/ksp/everything.txt

This includes transfer windows from places other than Kerbin as well.... which is actually more useful now that there is ISRU, and in my career save Duna is a major base of operations (soon the Jool system will be too), and Gilly is serving as a station as well for trips to Eve and Moho (why go all the way to Eve, and not add on a trip to Moho afterwards )

Edited September 29, 2015 by KerikBalm
If you're not averse to installing mods then Kerbal Alarm Clock has a transfer window function too.

If you're not averse to installing mods then Kerbal Alarm Clock has a transfer window function too.

Oh wow, I never knew that, and I even have it installed already thanks for pointing this out, I will have to look into it, sounds very convenient.

It never occurred to me it could be a KAC feature, if anything I would have started to look at MechJeb or a dedicated phase angle mod.

Oh wow, I never knew that, and I even have it installed already thanks for pointing this out, I will have to look into it, sounds very convenient.

It never occurred to me it could be a KAC feature, if anything I would have started to look at MechJeb or a dedicated phase angle mod.

Yes, Mechjeb also has a transfer window calculator.
I prefer Transfer Window Planner, which is an in-game implementation of alexmoon's web tool and written by the author of Kerbal Alarm Clock.

I prefer Transfer Window Planner, which is an in-game implementation of alexmoon's web tool and written by the author of Kerbal Alarm Clock.

Thank you, looks interesting. I think I'll slap that one on and give it a try, if I'm not happy with what KAC provides that is. Want to look into that before I add another mod. Or is this the same in the end? Like this one is already implemented in KAC? Guess I should just go and check, right

Thank you, looks interesting. I think I'll slap that one on and give it a try, if I'm not happy with what KAC provides that is. Want to look into that before I add another mod. Or is this the same in the end? Like this one is already implemented in KAC? Guess I should just go and check, right

I believe TWP uses a more sophisticated and accurate calculation, plus it lets you put restrictions on it, like maximum travel time, etc.
